Uses of Class
pingball.physics.Orientation

  • Packages that use Orientation 
    Package Description
    pingball.physics  

    • Uses of Orientation in pingball.physics

      Methods in pingball.physics that return Orientation 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Orientation TriangularBumper.getOrientation()
      Returns the orientation that this bumper is in
      Orientation Flipper.getOrientation()
      Returns the orientation that this flipper is in
      Orientation Orientation.rotateClockwise()
      Calculates and returns the next orientation angle from this after a 90 degree rotation clockwise
      Orientation Orientation.rotateCounterClockwise()
      Calculates and returns the next orientation angle from this after a 90 degree rotation counter-clockwise
      static Orientation Orientation.valueOf(java.lang.String name)
      Returns the enum constant of this type with the specified name.
      static Orientation[] Orientation.values()
      Returns an array containing the constants of this enum type, in the order they are declared.
      Methods in pingball.physics with parameters of type Orientation 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void Board.addLeftFlipper(java.lang.String name, int x, int y, Orientation orientation)
      Creates and adds a new left flipper to the board based with the given parameters and with coefficient of reflection equal to 1.0.
      void Board.addRightFlipper(java.lang.String name, int x, int y, Orientation orientation)
      Creates and adds a new right flipper to the board based with the given parameters and with coefficient of reflection equal to 1.0.
      void Board.addTriangularBumper(java.lang.String name, int x, int y, Orientation orientation)
      Creates and adds a new triangle shaped bumper to the board based with the given parameters and with coefficient of reflection equal to 1.0.
      Constructors in pingball.physics with parameters of type Orientation 
      Constructor and Description
      Flipper(Board board, java.lang.String name, int x, int y, Orientation orientation, boolean isLeftFlipper)
      Creates a Flipper with coefficient of reflection set to 0.95 and with the desired parameters.
      TriangularBumper(Board board, java.lang.String name, int x, int y, Orientation orientation)
      Create a new triangle shaped bumper based on the following parameters with coefficient of reflection equal to 1.0.
